extendedInfo.description: This go-to-guide contains clinical resource information intended for the oncology healthcare professional. Below is a brief description of the resources included in this application. The application is intended for use by US healthcare professionals only.Be sure to download this application for exclusive access to these features:Risk Assessment Checklist - assess chemotherapy-induced febrile neutropenia risk factors with this digital checklist.Selected Laboratory Values - this easy-to-use resource allows you access to commonly used laboratory values and formulas at the swipe of a finger. Consult your institutionâs laboratory to ensure appropriate interpretation of results.Anemia Evaluation Info â offers useful assessment information to be used in your daily practiceAmgen MedInfo â direct access to Amgen MedInfo via your phoneUseful Websites â a list of useful websites is provided that contain clinical resource informationIf you have any questions, please contact Amgen at +1 (805) 447-3505. If you do not agree to the terms and conditions of this agreement, please do not use this application.
